Enums/BoxCastError.html#/s:7BoxCast0aB5E.name: badRequest
Enums/BoxCastError.html#/s:7BoxCast0aB5E.abstract: The request could not be understood due to malformed syntax.

Enums/BoxCastError.html#/s:7BoxCast0aB5E.name: invalidToken
Enums/BoxCastError.html#/s:7BoxCast0aB5E.abstract: The access token provided is expired, revoked, malformed or invalid for other reasons.

Enums/BoxCastError.html#/s:7BoxCast0aB5E.name: conflict
Enums/BoxCastError.html#/s:7BoxCast0aB5E.abstract: The request could not be completed due to a conflict with the current state of the resource.

Enums/BoxCastError.html#/s:7BoxCast0aB5E.name: tooManyRequests
Enums/BoxCastError.html#/s:7BoxCast0aB5E.abstract: The user has sent too many requests in a given amount of time.

Enums/BoxCastError.html#/s:7BoxCast0aB5E.name: invalidClient
Enums/BoxCastError.html#/s:7BoxCast0aB5E.abstract: Client authentication failed (e.g., unknown client, no client authentication included, or

Enums/BoxCastError.html#/s:7BoxCast0aB5E.name: invalidGrant
Enums/BoxCastError.html#/s:7BoxCast0aB5E.abstract: The provided authorization grant is invalid, expired or revoked.

Enums/BoxCastError.html#/s:7BoxCast0aB5E.name: unauthorizedClient

Classes/BoxCastClient.html#/s:7BoxCast0a.name: setUp(scope:configuration:)
Classes/BoxCastClient.html#/s:7BoxCast0a.abstract: Sets up the shared client. This must be called in order to use sharedClient.

Classes/BoxCastClient.html#/s:7BoxCast0a.name: sharedClient
Classes/BoxCastClient.html#/s:7BoxCast0a.abstract: The shared singleton object to be used for accessing resources.

Classes/BoxCastClient.html#/s:7BoxCast0a.name: isAuthorized
Classes/BoxCastClient.html#/s:7BoxCast0a.abstract: Returns a boolean indicating if the client is authorized.

Classes/BoxCastClient.html#/s:7BoxCast0a.name: getUpcomingBroadcasts(channelId:completionHandler:)
Classes/BoxCastClient.html#/s:7BoxCast0a.abstract: Returns a list of upcoming broadcasts for a specific channel.

Classes/BoxCastClient.html#/s:7BoxCast0a.name: getLiveBroadcasts(channelId:completionHandler:)
Classes/BoxCastClient.html#/s:7BoxCast0a.abstract: Returns a list of live broadcasts for a specific channel.

Classes/BoxCastClient.html#/s:7BoxCast0a.abstract: Returns a view for a specific broadcast.

Classes/BoxCastClient.html.name: BoxCastClient
Classes/BoxCastClient.html.abstract: The client for the BoxCast API. Use the client to access resources of the BoxCast ecosystem.
